casebody.data:
In re Appeal by: Toney L. HARRELL and T.L. Harrell's Land Development Co., Inc.
v.
The MIDLAND BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT and The Town of Midland No. 64P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Anthony Fox, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Nicolas E. Tosco, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The Town of Midland. John F. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, James E. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, Concord, for Harrell, Toney L., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 8th of March 2017 by Respondent (Town of Midland) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
